Grids

Depth-First Search

Algorithm | Non-weighted | Shortest path not guaranteed

Breadth-First Search

Algorithm | Weighted | Shortest path guaranteed

Dijkstra's

Algorithm | Weighted | Shortest path guaranteed

Algorithm | Weighted | Shortest path guaranteed

A*

Heuristic | Weighted | Shortest path not guaranteed
